about_the_game:
Anime And Your Life

This is a creative interpretation of reality.
This is a simulation of the operating system with its own rules.
Here you will find many different "useful" and "entertaining" applications.
Accept yourself, build yourself, accept reality, build your reality.

Main features:

  • Cute 2D tyan assistant!
  • Aggressive geopolitical card game. Fight with your charming assistant in an exciting card game!
  • Customization for your assistant! Large selection of all types of clothing and hairstyles!
  • Message Encryptor for safe and interesting communication with friends!
  • Browser, a full-fledged browser built into the game, for more convenient use of the Internet without being distracted from the game!
  • Planet, a whole planet where you can place various buildings that will affect the gameplay!
  • Music, 35 musical compositions that will not leave anyone indifferent!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game has cartoon nudity, scenes with the possibility of undressing.
The game has an element of cruelty in the form of an explosion of atomic missiles on the surface of the planet.

This is a creative interpretation of reality.

Here you will find many different "useful" and "entertaining" applications.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux OS
  • Processor: Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64 bits
  • Processor: Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card

short_description: This is more than a game. This is your whole life!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Russian*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
